OrgName: Acorn Performance Group, Inc. DBA Acorn Systems, Inc.
activities: The Company is engaged by its customers to implement profit improvement solutions, which includes modeling certain business processes of customers' organization, which during such process, may require the Company to have access to personal data of the individuals within the customers' organization. From time to time, the Company also solicits personal contact information for marketing purposes.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Off-line, on-line, manually processed data, human resources data
recoursemech: For complaints that cannot be resolved between the Company and the complainant, the complaint may be submitted for dispute resolution to the European Union Data Protection Authories or the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner
